message: Statify is a website monitoring service, It's my first python django project, right now it's just a landing page but feedback would be welcomed. Thanks. http://statifyme.com I'm excited by building it and using python and django.
i signed up to be notified. currently using montastic.com, looking forward to comparing.
Thanks for signing up, I should have the blog up soon too. The service will be up very soon and I aim to make it easy to setup and start monitoring. Thanks again.
